Articles.Content: I have a problem, when i will launch the first stage/my rocket, i press space but not happen i can't launch the stage, the stage does not change, pls help me

If you are using liquid fuel engines - and I assume you are because you haven't given much to go on - you have to throttle up to generate thrust.  Throttle to max with Z, or little by little with SHIFT.  Cut throttle completely with X, or little by little with CTRL.

Hi there and welcome to the forum, @HugoCastroBr !

To be able to help you, we need a bit more information as outlined here:

 

and here, respectively (unmodded / modded installs)

 

 

This particular issue you're mentioning, I've seen once, turned out a Steam file verification could resolve it, why not give that a try.

check if your liquid fuel engines are throttled on. check if you have control (an astronaut on board, or a probe core with electricity). try to press space again. try to restart the game.

if all this fails, take some screenshots and post them here.

Did you by and chance hit Mod + L? This causes the stage light to turn pink and prevents you from staging.  (To fix this just hit Mod + L again). If the stage light is green than you probably just forgot to throttle or it is a bug.
